turn_wheel_clockwise.description: Turn the wheel clockwise for the cart to move.

turn_wheel_counterclockwise.description: Turn the wheel counterclockwise for the cart to reverse.

spin_wheel_forward.description: Spin the wheel forward for the cart to progress.

spin_wheel_backward.description: Spin the wheel backward for the cart to move in reverse direction.

rotate_wheel_backwards.description: Rotate the wheel backwards for the cart to move backward

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel so that the cart can move forward.

spin_wheel_clockwise.description: Spin the wheel in clockwise direction to push the cart forward

spin_wheel_counter_clockwise.description: Spin the wheel in counter-clockwise direction to navigate the cart backward

clean_inside_cart.description: Clean the inside of the cart to maintain hygiene.

clean_outside_cart.description: Clean the outside of the cart to maintain aesthetics and hygiene.

wipe_cart_interior.description: Wipe the inside of the cart body to keep it clean.

wipe_cart_exterior.description: Wipe the exterior of the cart to remove dust and dirt.

clean_cart_interior.description: Clean the interior of the cart body.

clean_cart_body.description: Clean the body of the cart using a cloth.

move_cart_right.description: Move the cart to the right by spinning the wheels clockwise.

move_cart_left.description: Move the cart to the left by spinning the wheels counterclockwise.

clean_cart_wheel.description: Clean the wheel of the cart to remove any debris.

overall_cart_cleaning.description: Perform overall cleaning of the cart, including the body and wheels.

cart_at_rest.description: The cart is at rest, and does not require any actions at this moment.

move_cart_forward.description: Move the cart forward by spinning the wheels in forward direction.

move_cart_reverse.description: Move the cart in reverse direction by spinning the wheels backward.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel of the cart to keep it functioning smoothly.

clean_cart_completely.description: Clean the complete cart, body and wheels to maintain hygiene and durability.

initial_state_of_cart.description: The cart is in its initial condition, no actions required to be performed.

push_cart.description: Push the cart by spinning the wheels.

clean_entire_cart.description: Clean the entire cart, comprising the body and wheels for maintaining cleanliness.

status_complete_for_cart.description: The cart is in its initial state, no additional action is required.

move_cart_backwards.description: Move the cart backwards by rotating the wheels.

complete_cart_cleaning.description: Clean the entire cart, both body and wheels.

initial_cart_state.description: The cart is in its initial state and does not require any movement.

move_cart.description: Move the cart by rotating the wheels.

clean_cart.description: Clean the cart including the body and wheels.

status_complete.description: The cart is in its initial state and does not require any action.

move_cart_backward.description: Move the cart backward by spinning the wheels in counter-clockwise direction.

bring_cart_to_initial_state.description: The cart is in idle state, no action required.
